question: What was significant about the Canadian navy at the end of the Second World War?
possible_answers: A. It was the third-largest navy in the world.
B. It was the fourth-largest navy in the world.
C. It was the largest navy in the world.
D. It was the second-largest navy in the world.
main_question: What was significant about the Canadian navy at the end of the Second World War?
answer: A. It was the third-largest navy in the world.
explanatory_sentence: At the end of the Second World War, Canada had the third largest navy in the world.
